chat.buyerMilestoneClaimedInfo: You have 7 days starting from the milestone claiming date to take an action, otherwise the system will accept the milestone and complete the payment.

SowCommands.SUBMIT_info: The seller submitted the Statement of Work.
SowCommands.ACCEPT_AND_PAY_info: The buyer accepted and funded the multisig.
SowCommands.CLAIM_MILESTONE_MET_info:
The seller claimed the milestone as met.
The buyer has 7 days starting from today to take an action, otherwise the system will accept the milestone and complete the payment.
SowCommands.REJECT_info: The Statement of Work was rejected.
SowCommands.SYSTEM_SIGN_info: Since the buyer didn't accept the milestone within the predetermined date, the payment to the seller was completed by Uncommon Creative.
